data.name: Dunkertons Park
data.full_address: Dunkertons Park, Dowdeswell Park, The Barlands, London Rd, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham GL52 6UT, United Kingdom

reviews.review_text: Food is ok but the music inside makes it impossible to enjoy it. It‚Äôs loud and bad taste. It‚Äôs impossible to have comfortable chat and when placing order double check what a person taking it heard because they could understand "vegan" as "bacon". Not going there anymore, very frustrating.

translations.en: Food is ok but the music inside makes it impossible to enjoy it. It‚Äôs loud and bad taste. It‚Äôs impossible to have comfortable chat and when placing order double check what a person taking it heard because they could understand "vegan" as "bacon". Not going there anymore, very frustrating.

reviews.review_text: It's like a big food hall in the countryside in a good way. There was a really overpriced clothes shop called something like Holland and Cooper selling awfully clothes at stupid prices, avoid that and you'll have a great experience

translations.en: It's like a big food hall in the countryside in a good way. There was a really overpriced clothes shop called something like Holland and Cooper selling awfully clothes at stupid prices, avoid that and you'll have a great experience

reviews.review_text: Fantastic place..great food stalls..great atmosphere..visit every time I'm in Gloucestershire

translations.en: Fantastic place..great food stalls..great atmosphere..visit every time I'm in Gloucestershire

reviews.review_text:
Visited to take the tour as a fan of the cider for many years.
A very informative host (Alistair) who greeted us with a glass of cider, and various top ups from various varieties at stages of manufacture.
The cheese/cider pairing with nice fresh bread made on site.
No pressure to leave once the tour was over.
A great shop, places to sit and eat.
I‚Äôll come for lunch again and stay til closing!
Very enjoyable Thankyou.
reviews.business_response_text: That is great to hear Tim. :-) Thanks for the review

text.en: That is great to hear Tim. :-) Thanks for the review

translations.en:
Visited to take the tour as a fan of the cider for many years.
A very informative host (Alistair) who greeted us with a glass of cider, and various top ups from various varieties at stages of manufacture.
The cheese/cider pairing with nice fresh bread made on site.
No pressure to leave once the tour was over.
A great shop, places to sit and eat.
I‚Äôll come for lunch again and stay til closing!
Very enjoyable Thankyou.

reviews.review_text: Loved it, so much choice and so well looked after. Clean, tidy

translations.en: Loved it, so much choice and so well looked after. Clean, tidy

reviews.review_text: We absolutely love the weekly quiz at Dunkertons! It‚Äôs genuinely the highlight of our week. The quizmaster is brilliant ‚Äî she‚Äôs so, so funny and keeps the energy up all night. Every week is a laugh, and she always makes everyone feel welcome. We‚Äôve been to a lot of pub quizzes, but this one is hands-down our favourite. Can‚Äôt recommend it enough!
reviews.business_response_text: Thank you for taking the time to review us Emma! We really appreciate it and we will be sure to pass on the kind comments to our resident quizmaster.

text.en: Thank you for taking the time to review us Emma! We really appreciate it and we will be sure to pass on the kind comments to our resident quizmaster.

translations.en: We absolutely love the weekly quiz at Dunkertons! It‚Äôs genuinely the highlight of our week. The quizmaster is brilliant ‚Äî she‚Äôs so, so funny and keeps the energy up all night. Every week is a laugh, and she always makes everyone feel welcome. We‚Äôve been to a lot of pub quizzes, but this one is hands-down our favourite. Can‚Äôt recommend it enough!

reviews.review_text: Excellent food options, with huge variety at good prices.  Plus spectacular cider and beer choices as well as a great vibe!!

translations.en: Excellent food options, with huge variety at good prices.  Plus spectacular cider and beer choices as well as a great vibe!!

reviews.review_text:
Situated just outside of Cheltenham ‚Ä¶..

I would like to give it a 4, because the ever increasing, sprawling mass of tents has totally destroyed the original ambiance of the place, but when you see so people enjoying themselves, you have to think to yourself, don‚Äôt be a Humbug‚Ä¶..

A wide variety of ‚ÄòStreet Food‚Äô under cover, but ‚Äòunder cover‚Äô is a bit too dark in the day time, probably better to sit inside at night.

Plenty of space to sit outside on the benches, and because the place has become so popular, there is now a lack of car parking spaces at busy times, for those people who live in in N‚Äôam, there is a ‚ÄòDunkerBus‚Äô which rides for the Prom ? to the venue

Staff behind the Bar are a credit to the organisation, helpful, fun, and full humour.

And now I have said that, I suppose you are going to come across some miserable git‚Ä¶..

Well done to all concerned, probably mush more exciting than selling Superdry clothes !

A wide variety of ‚ÄòStreet Food‚Äô under cover, but ‚Äòunder cover‚Äô is a bit too dark in the day time, probably better to sit inside at night.

Plenty of space to sit outside on the benches, and because the place has become so popular, there is now a lack of car parking spaces at busy times, for those people who live in in N‚Äôam, there is a ‚ÄòDunkerBus‚Äô which rides for the Prom ? to the venue

And now I have said that, I suppose you are going to come across some miserable git‚Ä¶..

Well done to all concerned, probably mush more exciting than selling Superdry clothes !

reviews.review_text: Great venue! Lovely cider and the manager nick is even better, tasty food and exceptional staff what more could you want!
reviews.business_response_text: Thank you Rhys, we really appreciate the feedback :-)

text.en: Thank you Rhys, we really appreciate the feedback :-)

translations.en: Great venue! Lovely cider and the manager nick is even better, tasty food and exceptional staff what more could you want!

reviews.review_text:
Was here last night for the Abba tribute, which I had really been looking forward to and came from London to attend with my Mum and sister. Was wholly disappointed with the whole night.
Tickets were quite obviously over sold. The place was literally heaving to the point of being unpleasant and uncomfortable. It was impossible to enjoy the band, no space to move or even dance from side to side. Those who did pretty much invaded everyone's space and spilt drink over you. It was so unbearable my mum left to sit in the car after the first half. My sister and I endured up to about the 3rd song after the interval and called it a night. Hugely disappointed, so much so that I won't be buying tickets for the Ibiza Infinity Orchestra which really appealed to me.

translations.en:
Was here last night for the Abba tribute, which I had really been looking forward to and came from London to attend with my Mum and sister. Was wholly disappointed with the whole night.
Tickets were quite obviously over sold. The place was literally heaving to the point of being unpleasant and uncomfortable. It was impossible to enjoy the band, no space to move or even dance from side to side. Those who did pretty much invaded everyone's space and spilt drink over you. It was so unbearable my mum left to sit in the car after the first half. My sister and I endured up to about the 3rd song after the interval and called it a night. Hugely disappointed, so much so that I won't be buying tickets for the Ibiza Infinity Orchestra which really appealed to me.

reviews.review_text: Nice food and a good concept. Quite a loud ambiance. Not very clear on the process when you arive. Reasonably priced.

translations.en: Nice food and a good concept. Quite a loud ambiance. Not very clear on the process when you arive. Reasonably priced.

reviews.review_text: A shambles. Salsa band tonight 1000 people on site I would guess , but just two bars and 4 serving staff. Overcrowded and no air con in a heatwave. At the interval, 9pm, all the eateries closed on the dot. Nobody knew the timings / running order. We went home and watched Glastonbury on the telly.

translations.en: A shambles. Salsa band tonight 1000 people on site I would guess , but just two bars and 4 serving staff. Overcrowded and no air con in a heatwave. At the interval, 9pm, all the eateries closed on the dot. Nobody knew the timings / running order. We went home and watched Glastonbury on the telly.

reviews.review_text: So there's no doubt that this is a spectacular venue with a fantastic (if pricey) food and drink offering. However, the decision to have large fire pits burning all day even when the weather is 20+ degrees is irresponsible verging on insane. Several members of our group were asthmatic and impacted by the constant smoke and ash issuing from these. Additionally it's incredibly environmentally unfriendly and wasteful to be burning so much wood in such unnecessary circumstances. A bizarre decision that has ruined this otherwise phenomenal outdoor space.

translations.en: So there's no doubt that this is a spectacular venue with a fantastic (if pricey) food and drink offering. However, the decision to have large fire pits burning all day even when the weather is 20+ degrees is irresponsible verging on insane. Several members of our group were asthmatic and impacted by the constant smoke and ash issuing from these. Additionally it's incredibly environmentally unfriendly and wasteful to be burning so much wood in such unnecessary circumstances. A bizarre decision that has ruined this otherwise phenomenal outdoor space.

reviews.review_text: A fantastic shop, delicious product and beautiful location. You can pick up all sorts of cider and cider related products (think glasses, demijohns and tankards) They refill bottles for a greatly reduced price if you bring it back. Well worth a visit if you're in the area - only a couple of miles outside of Cheltenham.
reviews.business_response_text:
Hi Josh!
Thanks so much for leaving this review, we are really glad that you had a wonderful visit! Hopefully you have been back sinceüçè

text.en:
Hi Josh!
Thanks so much for leaving this review, we are really glad that you had a wonderful visit! Hopefully you have been back sinceüçè

translations.en: A fantastic shop, delicious product and beautiful location. You can pick up all sorts of cider and cider related products (think glasses, demijohns and tankards) They refill bottles for a greatly reduced price if you bring it back. Well worth a visit if you're in the area - only a couple of miles outside of Cheltenham.

reviews.review_text: Outdoor and indoor seating for a wide range of food stalls and a large bar. Fire pits are nice on a cooler evening
reviews.business_response_text: Thank you Mike, Catch you again on site soon.

text.en: Thank you Mike, Catch you again on site soon.

translations.en: Outdoor and indoor seating for a wide range of food stalls and a large bar. Fire pits are nice on a cooler evening

reviews.review_text: Great place for social drinks , great selection of food

translations.en: Great place for social drinks , great selection of food

reviews.review_text:
Food court with multiple restaurants. And beautiful outdoor seating with fire pit

We had Indian food from Bombay street food.  Delicious lamb shank wrapped in naan.  Great prices
reviews.business_response_text: Thank you for the great review, see you on site soon!

text.en: Thank you for the great review, see you on site soon!

translations.en:
Food court with multiple restaurants. And beautiful outdoor seating with fire pit

We had Indian food from Bombay street food.  Delicious lamb shank wrapped in naan.  Great prices

reviews.review_text: Some interesting and varied food options here, so it's often a stop at the end of a hike!  Yesterday, I had an excellent and sizeable cheese and ham toasties from the Boulangerie, along with nice coffee, and last week, a good-value smoothie bowl from the creperie.  Tasty but still quite chilly, from the freezer.
reviews.business_response_text: Thanks Frank! Hope to see you again soon

text.en: Thanks Frank! Hope to see you again soon

translations.en: Some interesting and varied food options here, so it's often a stop at the end of a hike!  Yesterday, I had an excellent and sizeable cheese and ham toasties from the Boulangerie, along with nice coffee, and last week, a good-value smoothie bowl from the creperie.  Tasty but still quite chilly, from the freezer.

reviews.review_text: Best cider I have ever tasted! Takes me back to when I first tasted stowford press when that launched (before it turned into strongbow!) Dunkertons organic cider is so good! We had a great time at the launch event, thanks to all involved in such a fun evening!

translations.en: Best cider I have ever tasted! Takes me back to when I first tasted stowford press when that launched (before it turned into strongbow!) Dunkertons organic cider is so good! We had a great time at the launch event, thanks to all involved in such a fun evening!

reviews.review_text: Absolutely love it, great choice of food and drinks and most of all I love the atmosphere.  Woman shop at the HC boutique will men have a cheeky cider or 2

translations.en: Absolutely love it, great choice of food and drinks and most of all I love the atmosphere.  Woman shop at the HC boutique will men have a cheeky cider or 2
